text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: The value of the measured breathing frequency. The breathing frequency is the number of breaths per minute.

purpose.value: This Observation resource represents the BreathingFrequency concept (NL-CM:12.5.2) of the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) Respiration-v3.2(2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/Respiration-v3.2(2020EN)).

copyright.value: Copyright and related rights waived via CC0, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. This does not apply to information from third parties, for example a medical terminology system. The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.

comment.value: This profile on the Observation resource represents the BreathingFrequency concept (NL-CM:12.5.2) of zib Respiration. It can be used together with the [zib-Respiration](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Respiration) profile on the Observation resource, which groups references to the current and other resources on `Observation.hasMember`.

definition.value: Date and if possible time of measurement.
The value of the measured breathing frequency. The breathing frequency is the number of breaths per minute.
